## VariableMap.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `VariableMap` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(workspace: Workspace, potentialMap?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace this map belongs to. |
|  potentialMap | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if this holds variables that don't exist in the workspace yet. |
